260.17.text:

265.82.text:

272.27.text:

277.48.text:

280.69.text:

283.67.text:

318.76.text:

324.52.text:

328.54.text:

670.14.text:

674.81.text:

746.57.text:
of extent of the problem. Is it just one or

789.94.text:

795.24.text:

859.75.text:

868.66.text:

990.13.text:
this is, you think why on earth did we bother

obvious. As you go up the different levels,

1000.52.text:

1003.68.text:

1074.11.text:

1337.41.text:

2064.10.text:
